alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 02 at 10:02PM EST until January 03 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST /9 AM CST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Sustained winds of 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. Strong west to northwest winds are expected behind a strong cold front. * WHERE...Coastal Walton, Bay, Gulf, and Franklin counties. * WHEN...Through Monday morning * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained winds of 26 to 39 mph are expected for at least 2 hours, or gusts between 40 to 57 mph for any length of time are possible. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; South Walton
